ai-tha-ap88:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap88:1.2_0: I’m the one who bursts out my eyes.
ai-tha-ap88:1.3_0: and the path of walking mindfully.
ai-tha-ap88:1.4_0: he sat on the nest of Pāvā.
ai-tha-ap88:2.3_0: raising his hands in respectful salutation,
ai-tha-ap88:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap88:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap88:3.4_0: you’ll find the fruit of the good.”
ai-tha-ap88:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Simila.
ai-tha-ap88:6.1_0: Second: Living for (them) held the Elder Nuns,
